metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31018 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Driver for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer, where an unprivileged regular user can cause aNULL-pointer dereference, which may lead to denial of service.
